title: Is there a place for actual mature conversations about the game?
body: Everyone witch hunts or hates on any idea ever.  I don't even know where to post this out of fear of backlash.

replies.body:
is it really backlash? or just constructive critism and that people don't agree with your ideas?

[this guy](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/hEnR3j0F-im-toxic-and-wantneed-to-stop-help) seems to be getting a mature conversation going.
What exactly is constructive about that thread?

People are giving him ideas on how to improve instead of what you may claim as backlash?

[this dude](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/PBq6EpnE-permabanunban) is getting some disagreement, would you consider that backlash?

I have no idea what topic you want to talk about, but for behavior stuff, if you are honestly looking for help, many will help.

If you blame others for your behavior, you will get alot of people disagreeing with you. Whether you consider that backlash is another matter.

If you want to talk about behavioral systems, unless you get your facts right, you'll get alot of backlash as well.
What kind of *mature* content are we talking, *SÃ¨x* crazed Eve?

Definitely not the boards.

I got downvoted for posting [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/rNEE5GNy-i-just-got-a-chest-a-gemstone-a-key-and-a-skin-from-one-chest)
Maybe people just didn't find the joke funny? It was kind of meh to me.

Your comment wasn't interesting to me so I downvoted it.

See how bs this is?

Not really. That is kind of the point. Don't agree or like the post/reply? Down vote.

Why would i get upset about some small number on the screen? Hell, i think my replies make me look like an asshole, ima down vote too.
Downvote. The one true sign of immaturity and the end of times.

>Is there a place for actual mature conversations about the game?

your name and this question clash harder than a feminist and a ladies-room sign

https://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/xs8AAOSwv0tVFJvy/s-l300.jpg

The entire internet is a witch hunt dude. People seek out those who share their opinion and then form a nice little circle where anyone who doesn't agree is downvoted and passive or aggressively attacked. Any forum you go to, from "Raw Feeding Dogs" to "Religious Discussions" you'll find the same types of people vehemently arguing their point of view and taking anything other than complete agreement as an attack on their persons.
Directly attacking someone and calling for their job is wrong.

gameplay is the worst

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/Eqk9jMhb-i-want-to-congratulate-ghostcrawler

Wtf is wrong with these people?

It is difficult to restrict the tone of a conversation without restrictions the participants.

People each have a certain online persona they tend to follow, and for many it is either a light minded one or a disparaging one.
